channel.title: ispconfig on Thoughts, Views & More...
channel.description: Recent content in ispconfig on Thoughts, Views & More...

item.title: ISPConfig: Where are the templates for the config files and default pages?
item.description: IspConfig is a very powerful free server control panel with many features. It has a interesting feature as it generate error pages and default index of each domain. Which you can easily edit and get all future generated pages by your choice.
